property.name: smart.dfs.enabled
property.description: For SSM, all functions disabled except rpc and RESTApi service if false.

property.name: smart.ignore.dirs
property.description: SSM will completely ignore files under the given directories. For more than one directories, they should be separated by ",".

property.name: smart.cover.dirs
property.description: SSM will only fetch files under the given directories. For more than one directories, they should be separated by ",".

property.name: smart.work.dir
property.description: This directory is used as a work directory for SSM to store tmp files and data. The default path is "/system/ssm", and SSM will ignore files under the work directory. No more than one directory can be set as the work directory.

property.name: smart.server.rpc.address
property.description: rpc server of SSM

property.name: smart.server.rpc.handler.count
property.description: number of handlers in rpc server

property.name: smart.server.http.address
property.description: REST server of SSM

property.name: smart.agent.port
property.description: SmartAgent port

property.name: smart.agent.master.port
property.description: SmartAgent master port

property.name: smart.namespace.fetcher.batch
property.description: Batch size of Namespace fetcher

property.name: smart.namespace.fetcher.producers.num
property.description: Number of producers in namespace fetcher

property.name: smart.namespace.fetcher.consumers.num
property.description: Number of consumers in namespace fetcher

property.name: smart.rule.executors
property.description: Max number of rules that can be executed in parallel

property.name: smart.cmdlet.executors
property.description: Max number of cmdlets that can be executed in parallel

property.name: smart.dispatch.cmdlets.extra.num
property.description: The number of extra cmdlets dispatched by Smart Server

property.name: smart.cmdlet.dispatchers
property.description: Max number of cmdlet dispatchers that work in parallel

property.name: smart.cmdlet.mover.max.concurrent.blocks.per.srv.inst
property.description: Max number of file mover cmdlets that can be executed in parallel per SSM service. 0 means unlimited.

property.name: smart.action.move.throttle.mb
property.description: The throughput limit (MB) for SSM move overall

property.name: smart.action.copy.throttle.mb
property.description: The throughput limit (MB) for SSM copy overall

property.name: smart.action.ec.throttle.mb
property.description: The throughput limit (MB) for SSM EC overall

property.name: smart.action.local.execution.disabled
property.description: Actions will not be executed on SSM server if true.

property.name: smart.cmdlet.max.num.pending
property.description: Maximum number of pending cmdlets in SSM server. Default value is 20000.

property.name: smart.cmdlet.hist.max.num.records
property.description: Maximum number of historic cmdlet records kept in SSM server. Oldest cmdlets will be deleted if exceeds the threshold.

property.name: smart.cmdlet.hist.max.record.lifetime
property.description: Maximum life time of historic cmdlet records kept in SSM server. Cmdlet record will be deleted from SSM server if exceeds the threshold. Valid time unit can be 'day', 'hour', 'min', 'sec'. The minimum update granularity is 5sec.

property.name: smart.cmdlet.cache.batch
property.description: Maximum batch size of cmdlet batch insert.

property.name: smart.copy.scheduler.base.sync.batch
property.description: Maximum batch size of copyscheduler base sync batch insert.

property.name: smart.file.diff.max.num.records
property.description: Maximum file diff records with useless state.

property.name: smart.status.report.period
property.description: The status report period for actions. The time unit is millisecond.

property.name: smart.status.report.period.multiplier
property.description: The report period multiplied by this multiplier defines largest report interval.

property.name: smart.status.report.ratio
property.description: If the finished actions ratio equals or exceeds this value, status report will be triggered.

property.name: smart.top.hot.files.num
property.description: The number of top hot files displayed on web UI.

property.name: smart.namespace.fetcher.ignore.unsuccessive.inotify.event
property.description: Skip fetch the entire namespace and only use available iNotify events to update namespace if true. NOTE: This may leads to some unpredictable consequences and should only be used for testing.

property.name: smart.cmdlet.dispatcher.log.disp.result
property.description: Log dispatch result for each cmdlet been dispatched.

property.name: smart.cmdlet.dispatcher.log.disp.metrics.interval
property.description: Time interval in millisecond to log statistic metrics of cmdlet dispatcher. If no cmdlet dispatched in the time interval, then no output for this interval. Disable the logger if equals 0.

property.name: smart.compression.impl
property.description: Default compression codec for SSM compression (Zlib Lz4, Bzip2, snappy).
